page.title: 05FURNISHING & DECORATION
page.content: Perhaps due to the decline in family size , the living space in newly-built property is smaller, but is utilised more efficiently.Most homes have five or six rooms,with bathroom and lavatory as one of them. The main room has a fireplace for electric or coal fires, and also Central Heating -fired by oil or solid-fuel furnaces, is provided. Mains drainage and sewage disposal, piped water supply, Electricity (240 volts) are connected to all homes. There is no Natural Gas, but Calor is available. Telephone service is available. {FURNISHING AND DECORATION Almost every house is comfortably furnished. Floors covered with wool/nylon carpetting or Vinyl tiles and cork tiles .
